item.title: Managing General ICU Patients
item.authors: Dr. Thomas Grey, Dr. Nicole Brown
item.abstract: A guide to the effective management of patients in a general ICU setting, focusing on multi-disciplinary approaches.

item.title: Cardiac Care in ICU
item.authors: Dr. Ian Violet, Dr. Laura Red
item.abstract: Insights into specialized care for cardiac patients in the ICU, highlighting recent advancements in technology.

item.title: Neurological Monitoring in ICU
item.authors: Dr. Chris Orange, Dr. Dana Yellow
item.abstract: Techniques and importance of neurological monitoring in ICU patients, with a focus on emerging methods.
